email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 15,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY for this shipment. The freight rate is USD 45/MT on a CIF basis. The vessel has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225m. Laycan is 25-30 September. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Thank you for the prompt response. USD 45/MT seems a bit high. We are seeing rates closer to USD 40/MT from other brokers. Could you revise your quote?

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Quote
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

After discussing with the owners, we can offer a revised rate of USD 42/MT. The vessel OCEAN HARMONY is still available for the same laycan. Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Michael Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Michael,

USD 42/MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the arrangements for the OCEAN HARMONY. We will handle the insurance and documentation on our end.

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Final Details
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Thank you for your confirmation. The OCEAN HARMONY is now fixed for your shipment. The laycan remains 25-30 September, and the demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Please let me know if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Michael Lee
